name: Lantern Dragonette
description: A small dragon known for creating and manipulating light, with a robust set of magical abilities.
memorable: Its ability to create bright light and its vulnerability to magical darkness make it unique.
goals: Guardianship of hidden knowledge and exploration in dark environments.
relations: Might be found with other dragons or magical creatures.
environment: Typically found in areas needing illumination or hidden knowledge.
strengths: Excellent intelligence and utility through light manipulation.
weaknesses: Very low strength and sensitive to magical darkness, hindering its abilities.
attacks: Bite attack and powerful fire breath in a 15-foot cone.
most_powerful_ability: Fire Breath, capable of dealing significant fire damage.
senses: Possesses darkvision allowing it to see in darkness.
skills: Skilled in Arcana, History, Nature, and Religion, reflecting its intelligence.
additional_information: Can shed bright light and dim light with its Lantern Belly ability.
Requires candle wax to activate its light-shedding ability.
Hindered in magical darkness, becoming vulnerable to necrotic damage.
test_queries: dragon with fire breath and light abilities
creature that sheds light and flies slowly
